name: Tiana Mahoutchian
review: Mt Pleasant Presbyterian Learning Center (preschool) is amazing and the best experience enrolling my daughter with the director, Lisa! Thank you so, so much. Wish we did it sooner! She loved it there from her first day

review: Love the worship services and parishioners. A great local community church.

review: God, Jesus and The Holy Spirit for everyone!
